title: Market share of soft drink companies in South Africa 2010
summary: This bar chart has 4 columns on the x axis representing Company, and Market share in South Africa in each Company on the y axis.
The maximum Market share in South Africa 49.8 is found at Company The Coca-Cola Co and the minimum is found at PepsiCo Inc where Company is 5.5.
The Market share in South Africa of Company PepsiCo Inc is 9.05% smaller than the maximum value at The Coca-Cola Co.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Market share in South Africa for 4 number of Companys.
The Market share in South Africa is appeared to be the highest at Company The Coca-Cola Co and lowest at Company PepsiCo Inc.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 4 columns on the x axis representing Company, and Market share in South Africa in each Company on the y axis.
The maximum Market share in South Africa 49.8 is found at Company The Coca-Cola Co and the minimum is found at PepsiCo Inc where Company is 5.5.
The Market share in South Africa of Company PepsiCo Inc is 9.05% smaller than the maximum value at The Coca-Cola Co.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Market share in South Africa for 4 number of Companys.
The maximum Market share in South Africa 49.8 is found at Company The Coca-Cola Co and the minimum is found at PepsiCo Inc where Company is 5.5.
Company PepsiCo Inc has 9.05 times less Market share in South Africa than Company The Coca-Cola Co which is the highest.
The Company The Coca-Cola Co has the highest Market share in South Africa, followed by Other, and Tiger Brands Ltd. Down to the Company PepsiCo Inc which is the lowest.
The highest value 49.8 at The Coca-Cola Co is almost 1.99 times larger than the average value 25.0.
Summing up the values of all Companys, we get total 100.0.
